function on the Pandas DataFrame. It allows us to shift a column down (forward in time) or
back (backward in time). We can take the series as a column of data, then create multiple copies
of the column, shifted forward or backward in time in order to create the samples with the
input and output elements we require. When a series is shifted down, NaN values are introduced
because we donâ€™t have values beyond the start of the series.
